name: Spot's Light
description:
This game works better in fullscreen!

Spot's Light is a game about a dog that's gotten lost at night. Thankfully a UFO passing by has the light to guide the way back home.

Use WASD and the arrows to control Spot and the Light! Having both controls on one keyboard means that you can guide Spot home solo or team up with a friend. Download the game for a surprise at the end!

This game is in development, I'd like to push it as far as possible and make a complete game for people to enjoy. If you like this game and want to see it complete or even more games in the future, then please leave a donation.
